data.name: Island of the Lost Demo
data.detailed_description:
Island of the Lost is a relaxing first-person exploration game. In the midst of a storm you are marooned on an uncharted island. Journey through eight unique levels as you walk across immersive, vast environments in your search for a way off the island.



In this introductory Demo, relax and explore in the colourful surroundings of the Beach Archipelago, the first level of the game. Investigate tropical islands, hidden caves, discover secrets and search for treasures.

The full game Features

  • A relaxing, peaceful, exploration-adventure full of enchanting detail
  • 100 fun Steam Achievements to unlock!
  • Search for hidden treasures and special items, spread across all eight levels
  • Discover dozens of secret areas and Easter eggs
  • Watch out for hidden dangers and booby traps!
  • Featuring an original score by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
